page.title: 03BROMPTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Brompton Primary School is a rural junior school,which also serves several surrounding hamlets and villages.The school was built in 1976 and has 7 teaching classrooms.It has 2 playgrounds and a large field with ajoining nursery unit.The headteacher is Mr.P.Tame and there are a further 8 teaching staff,plus a caretaker.The school has 187 pupils taught in classes of 28 to 30 pupils.The curriculum is varied and includes swimming,taught in their own outdoor pool.After school activities include sport,music and drama.The school is used in the evening for a varied selection of adult classes.
